name: Sacred Apocalypse
description:
You woke up on a island and are surrounded by skeletons, survive for as long as you can but death is inevitable. If you’re not careful the skeletons will take your soul. Every 5 waves you get a chance to get a new weapon from the Mystery Box!

The game currently has:

  1. 7 Weapons
  2. 2 Enemies
  3. Online Scoreboard
  4. Juicy Mechanics

It is still a work in progress and will get updates over time to add more enemies, bosses, weapons and even customization for your character. Remember to follow me if you would like to keep up with the updates. If you enjoyed the game please leave a rating as it really helps me out! I am open to any feedback.
